doc.previous: The preceding reasoning is not valid if vanishes identically on C In such a case we could allow a trial function where c is a constant For such a trial function
doc.after: By appropriate choice of c V can assume any value unless the quantity inside the brackets vanishes Therefore the variational problem is meaningless unless
